pages.text: Tamen [fenlie zhe] ba “gulanjing” fencheng xuduo bufen [xiangxin yibufen, fouren yibufen].
Yi ni de zhu fashi, wo bi jiang shenwen tamen quanti,
bi jiang shenwen tamen suo zuo de [e xing].
Ni dang gongkai xuanbu ni suo feng dao de mingling, ni dang yuan bi bai ouxiang zhe.
Wo zuyi rang ni duifu chaoxiao zhe.
Tamen [chaoxiao zhe] ji bai an la, you bai qita shenling, tamen bujiu jiang zhidao [chongbai shenling de houguo].
Wo shen zhi ni wei tamen suo shuo de xiongzhong fannao.
Ni [mu sheng] dang zanmei songyang [zhu] ni de zhu [an la], dang tong koutou zhe yiqi koutou.
Ni dang chongbai ni de zhu, zhidao buke bimian de shike [siwang] jianglin ni [zhu].

An la de mingling [fuhuo de shi jian huo dui bu xinyang zhe de chengfa deng] jijiang lailin, suoyi, nimen buyao jiyu qiu cheng. Zanmei ta chaojue! Zhigaowushang de ta [an la] chaojue yu tamen suo chongbai de ouxiang.
Ta pai tianshimen feng ta de mingling jianglin tasuo yiyu de puren [bing shuo]:“Nimen dang jinggao [renlei]: Chu wo wai, zai meiyouying shou chongbai de zhu, yinci, nimen dang jingwei wo.”
Ta yi zhenli chuangzaole tiandi, zhigaowushang de ta [an la] chaojue yu tamen suo chongbai de ouxiang.
Ta you yidi jingye chuangzaole ren, er ren turan chengle yige gongkai de fankang zhe.
Ta wei nimen er chuangzao shengchu,[nimen] you ci ke huode [mao he pi zuo de] yizhuo [yuhan], hai you xuduo yichu, nimen ke chi qi rurou.
Dang nimen [wanshang] ba shengchu gan hui jia,[zaoshang] ba shengchu gan chuqu fangmu shi, nimen congzhong huodele rongyao.
